dt-api.name: rows().deselect()

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the deselected rows.
type.description: Deselect one or more rows in the table, based on the rows found by the `dt-api rows()` method.

dt-api.description: This method simply deselects the rows that have been found by the `dt-api rows()` selector method.

example.title: Deselect all rows which have a class of 'important'
